snippet.title: MAJOR winter update starts Dec 12th! | Roars from the Winterwind
snippet.description:
MAJOR winter update starts Dec 12th! | Roars from the Winterwind

▶ Explore the brand-new tundra habitat ❄️
▶ Hunt Tigrex, Lagombi, Volvidon, and Somnacanth! Plus, Barioth and small monsters Wulg and Cortos, who haven't been seen since the spring!
▶ Wield your very own Switch Axe!
▶ Meet your unique Palico who will assist with gathering materials and marking monsters on the field! 🐾 Change your Palico’s fur color, facial features, and give it a name. You can even take AR photos with your newly styled Palico 📸
▶ Send encouragement to your friends with cheers 📣
▶ Save more loadouts ⚔️

The hunt continues this winter! ⛄️


*You may need to restart your app to receive the update.
*Check the official website for details about the update.

Official website:
https://monsterhunternow.com/


Keep up with all the latest news on our social channels:
X: https://x.com/mh_now_en　
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mh_now_en/　
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MHNowEN　
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@mh_now_en

#MHNow #monsterhunternow #Tigrex #Lagombi #Volvidon #Somnacanth #monsterhunter #RoarsfromtheWinterwind
